column1: IN  THE COURT OF APPEAL OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST

column2: Order of the  Provincial  High  Court exercising writ
jurisdiction  in  terms  of Section  7 of High  Court of
the  Provinces  (Special  Provisions)  Act  No.  19  of
1990  read  with  Article  154  (P)  of the  Constitution
of the  Democratic  Socialist Republic  of Sri  Lanka,
as amended by the  13 th  Amendment.
